error.avatar_generic: Something went wrong when trying to upload your avatar.
error.avatar_pixel: Your image was too big. Please scale it down to less than 4000x4000 before uploading it again.

error.avatar_type: Your file was not recognized as an image.

error.loading_text: Something went wrong when trying to load the app data. The page will reload.
error.missing_edition: This session contains an edition that can't be found.
error.missing_roles: This session contains custom characters that can't be found. Please load them before joining! Missing roles: {0}
error.offline: The server seems to be offline

error.server_text: The connection timed out while waiting for the game server.

The game session has been locked.

error.session_public: You cannot join public game sessions.
error.session_rejoin: You cannot rejoin this game session yet.

error.video_text: Your browser prevented the app from auto-playing video chat, please close this message to start the chat.

prompt.chat_text: The app has problems reaching the chat server {0}, would you like to switch to {1}?
prompt.join_text: Please enter the number or name of the game session you want to join

prompt.leave_text_player: Are you sure you want to vacate your seat and return to the Lobby?

dialogue.terms: By using Blood on the Clocktower Online, you acknowledge that you have read and agree to the following terms & policies:
dialogue.terms_confirm: I confirm that I have read and agree to these terms and policies.

edition.clear_description: This will clear the Grimoire and Reminder tokens for you and everyone else. Are you sure?
edition.custom_text: Enter URL to a custom-script.json file
edition.error_character_text: This script contains more than 200 characters - please remove some of them.
edition.error_loading: Some characters could not be loaded: {0}
edition.error_script_text: This script was loaded but contains some problems. This usually means there are some lines that should not be there, according to the official Custom Script JSON schema.
edition.error_size_text: The script you selected has a size of {0}MB, but the maximum size is {1}MB.
edition.homebrew_description: Custom images from Homebrew scripts have been replaced with generic icons for security reasons. You can enable them through the Settings menu.
edition.title: Select an edition:

help.session_debug: Are you encountering any errors? You can send information about your session and recent history to our bug tracker, which will help us identify problems you're having:
help.session_debug2: Your app session is being tracked now and will be automatically sent to us. You can always stop this tracking manually by clicking the button below or reloading the app.
help.text1: This app (version {version}) is currently Under Construction.
help.text2: You can submit feedback through the {0} page or {1}. You can update your account email address and password {2}. If you want to buy the physical game, take a look at {3}.

reminder.custom_text: Enter a custom reminder note to add to {0}
reminder.title: Add Reminder Token to {0}

roles.title: Select the characters for {0}
roles.warning: Warning: there are characters selected that modify the game setup! You need to account for these yourself.

settings.background_text: Please enter a custom background URL, or leave it blank to remove a custom background.
settings.css_confirm: I know what I'm doing, let me change the look of my app
settings.css_confirm2: Please confirm that you want to keep the Custom CSS changes. Otherwise, they will be disabled automatically.
settings.css_text: You can modify your app appearance here by entering a URL to a Custom CSS file or the CSS code itself. The Pandemonium Institute is not responsible for CSS code provided by other users. Loading malicious CSS code might break your app!
settings.image_text: Are you sure you want to allow custom images? A malicious script file author might track your IP address this way. The Pandemonium Institute has no control over the images being provided by other users of the app.

user.error: There was an error loading the user details.

Do you really want to make {0} a Storyteller?

user.title: User profile

verification.code_sent: A code has been sent to your phone number, please enter it to verify your account!
verification.error_402: Disposable phone numbers can't be used for account verification.
verification.error_403: This phone number is already being used by a different user. If you think this is incorrect, please contact us at {0}.
verification.error_404: The verification attempt has expired or is invalid. Please try again.
verification.error_assigned: This phone number is already assigned to another user, please use a different phone number.
verification.error_cooldown: You have reached the maximum number of attempts. Please wait at least {0} minutes before trying again.
verification.error_other: Something went wrong: {0}. Please try again.
verification.error_restart: You have reached the maximum number of attempts. Please enter your phone number again.
verification.success: Verification successful! You can close this window now.
verification.text_body: We’re introducing SMS verification for accounts that join {0} to help protect the vibrant, respectful community that makes Blood on the Clocktower special. While most players already contribute to a fantastic culture, this step helps us take quick and appropriate action when the game experience is disrupted. Private games are unaffected.
verification.text_footer: Phone numbers are stored in a non-recoverable way.
verification.title: Account Verification

attention.return: Please return to the Town Square now!

firstnight.bluffs: Select the 3 blank "Demon Bluff" tokens to share with the Demon.
firstnight.gardener_text: When you're happy with the character setup, {0} to your Players. Once you have handed them out, you can proceed with setting up the First Night.
firstnight.title: Prepare First Night

gatherplayers.clear_text: Are you sure you want to remove all players?
gatherplayers.shuffle_text: Are you sure you want to randomize seatings?
gatherplayers.text: Add, shuffle or remove player seats here.
gatherplayers.text2: When there are enough seats for everyone, {0}
gatherplayers.title: Gather Your Players
gatherplayers.warning: You need at least 7 players for a regular game in Ravenswood Bluff.

open-eyes.tooltip_false: You won't see any other player's night signal and you won't be able to send private text messages to anyone but your neighbours and the Storyteller.
open-eyes.tooltip_open-eyes: You are able to send and receive private text messages to and from all other players, no matter where they sit. You will see the content of every night signal being sent and received, however there's a chance someone else will catch you.
open-eyes.tooltip_peek-eyes: You are able to send and receive private text messages to and from all other players, no matter where they sit. You will see who is sending and receiving night signals, but not the content of those signals. You can't be caught doing that.

pointing.prompt: Click on a player to point at them!

reveal.prompt:
Warning: This will end the game and reveal the Grimoire to all players!
Who won the game?
reveal.text: Reveal the game result and each player by clicking on their token. You can mouse over the token to peek at their character.
reveal.title: Reveal Grimoire

banned.description: Your account has been {0} due to your recent actions and can no longer be used to play on the app.
banned.expires: Your account has been banned until:
banned.expires2: Please refrain from repeat offenses, or you may receive a permanent ban.
banned.footer1: If you need assistance, please reach out to us via {0}.
banned.footer3: Kill with grace and die with dignity.
banned.permanent: Your account has been banned permanently.
banned.reason: The following reason has been provided:
banned.title: Account Banned

clock.description: Your computer clock is currently off by {0}. This can cause the app to malfunction during online play. You can synchronize your computer clock {1}. Once it is synchronized, reload the app.
clock.title: Please adjust your computer clock

lobby.bootlegger_warning:
This session is using the Bootlegger Loric, which means it has customised rules or characters outside of the official release, and is better suited for experienced players.
If you're new to Blood on the Clocktower, we recommend getting used to the standard rules and characters first, with one of the official base scripts. Trouble Brewing is perfect for the best first-game experience!
In any case, welcome — we're glad you're here!
Are you sure you want to join this session?
lobby.forced_private: You can no longer play in public games.
lobby.free_tier_unverified: You have a {0} account. You can play in any of the games above by clicking on the button on the left, unless they require a subscription. If you want to host your own games, get a subscription on {1}.
lobby.free_tier_verified: You have a {0} account. You need to {1} before you can play in public games. If you want to host your own games, get a subscription on {2}.

login.description: Please log in or create an account to continue:
